meta.title: Services - Eye On Idea
meta.description: Professional website packages, visual identity, CMS solutions, and ongoing support. Tailored digital solutions for B2B companies across Europe.

hero.title: Digital Solutions That Grow With You
hero.subtitle: Eye On Idea helps companies establish and grow a clear, professional digital presence. All projects are scoped individually, based on real needs - not templates.

overview.title: What We Do
overview.subtitle: Every service we offer is built around the same idea: that a business deserves a digital presence that actually works for it.

services.label: Website Packages
services.heading: A website built around your business
services.body: Not a template adjusted to fit, but a website scoped to where your company is right now. Whether you need a solid first presence or a platform built to grow with you, we work out the right scope before anything gets built.

services.label: Visual Identity
services.heading: Look credible from day one
services.body: Your logo, colours, and typography are often the first thing people judge you on. We design visual identities that hold up across your website, presentations, and print, so your brand looks intentional wherever it appears.

services.label: Additional Services
services.heading: Everything around your website
services.body: Domain registration, professional email, website copy, SEO reviews, and advisory sessions. These are the services that sit around your website and make the whole thing work properly, available individually or as part of a project.

services.label: Ongoing Support
services.heading: A website is not a one-time product
services.body: After launch, things change. Content needs updating, questions come up, and the site should keep improving. Our support plans give you a direct line and a set amount of time each month, so you are never left figuring things out alone.
